body.name: Nuby Medi-Nurser Medicine Bottle, Colors May Vary
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 14 hrs 4 mins
features: Easily dispenses medicine or vitamins to baby safely and accurately
Graduated clearly in milliliters and teaspoons for accurate measurements
Bottle is easy to grasp with side indentations
Colors may vary. You will receive one of the following colors: Blue, Green, or Purple
body.description: The Nuby Medi-Nurser provides an easy, neat and accurate way to administer oral medicine or vitamins to your baby. The uniquely designed container features side indentions for easy grasping and a snap-on nipple-ring assembly. Administering medicines from Medi-Nurser bypasses most of the taste buds and reduces baby’s ability to smell the medication. BPA Free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Philosophy At Luv n' care, we strive towards making the lives of parents and children easy, simple and fun. The highest quality standards, global trends and continual product development help us bring parents everything they need for their baby's development. Our products are inspired by nature and offer the best, safest and most simple choices for you and your baby.

Our Philosophy At Luv n' care, we strive towards making the lives of parents and children easy, simple and fun. The highest quality standards, global trends and continual product development help us bring parents everything they need for their baby's development. Our products are inspired by nature and offer the best, safest and most simple choices for you and your baby.

About Us Since the 1970's, Luv n' care has been dedicated to providing high quality, innovative products that are inspired by nature and make the lives of babies and parents easier, simpler and more fun. Our expertise covers all the important and exciting stages that parents encounter when their baby develops and grows, helping them to make important decisions along the journey of parenting. The Nûby brand covers feeding, weaning, soothing, play, bath and nursery and boasts patented innovation in all of its categories. Our significant financial investment in research, design, innovation and intellectual property protection keeps the brand at the forefront of technology and design ensuring it is the fastest growing baby brand worldwide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it… highly recommend it
reviews.reviewText: Awesome, little bottle… leak proof and tiny… decent flow without being to much… would be great to give medicine in like designed for but I personally bought it as a mini water bottle for my 4.5 months old nephew and it worked wonderfully for that too… my mom, my sister and her husband, and a couple of my aunts thought it was great as well… highly recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pacifier medicine dispenser is so amazing and easy to use!! I’ve used it countless times for medicines and vitamins for the grand babies. You won’t be disappointed with your purchase I promise you 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I wanted and needed !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad product, my little one would not use it but if she did then I bet it would work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for spitting babies!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! My son is teething and has been for a while and when it's particularly bad I have to give him Tylenol. Doing by syringe has proven difficult for not only myself, but my husband and mother in law as well. Being able to mix his dose with a little bit of formula in this little bottle is a lifesaver. He takes it no problem now. And it fits in the zipper case from my Frida mobile medicine cabinet. Syringe and zipper case pictured for size reference. I will say that I wish the top was screw on and didn't just pop on and off and I also wish it had a lid. This would help in getting a dose ready beforehand to store in my mini fridge and having it ready when he needs it. But other than that, it's a wonderful product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A mi hija no le gusto, porque creo que ya es un poco grande para esto pero si está bueno

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Measurements not accurate
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great idea, but the measurement numbers are not correct for dosage purposes, use an actual medicine cup or syringe then pour it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very helpful for antibiotics
reviews.reviewText: This was really helpful when my 7 month old had an ear infection. He loves his bottle, so giving him the antibiotics in this tiny bottle was so easy!

Es del tamaño perfecto ya que le te fin qué dar 20ml de medicamento a mi bebé. La chupeta es suave, el frasco es de plástico normal, no del tipo de mamil qué usan los bebés normalmente, solo espero el orificio sea lo suficientemente amplio para pasar el medicamento ya que es un compuesto de polvo con agua y en las tetinas de flujo lento no pasa.
If you have a baby you need this. It is the best thing I got for my new born. Giving medication or gripe water is so easy with this.

Cogí el biberón pq tengo que darle 5ml de leche con fortificante a mí bebé, y me daba mucho coraje usar uno de 120ml. Es perfecto para eso. Como única pega, la tetina es un poco dura. Es de plástico, pero se quitan todas las partes para desinfectar. No sé borran los números.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A lifesaver for our baby who never took a bottle, able to dispense medicine into her in seconds. Great buy.

Mon bébé a commencé à avoir des coliques peu après la naissance et ce biberon a été un achat très utile et indispensable pour lui donner ses médicaments anti-colique. Avant de trouver ce biberon, j'utilisais des tétines de biberons que mon bébé rejetait (nous sommes en allaitement exclusif). En plus de ça, les tétines conventionnelles coulent seules, ce qui compliquait la prise du médicament (débit trop rapide) et on renversait une grande partie du liquide à côté. Je recommande fortement.
